channel.title: Comments on: Any ideas why my game looks like this now? Colors are all wrong. Only cod.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: chemicalxbonex
item.dc:creator: chemicalxbonex
item.description:
Well I think this is fairly self explanatory. You are using an EM2. Clearly the game is rebelling against you and making you miserable until you use another gun.
Kidding. I honestly have no idea. Are you on PC or console?
item.content:encoded:
Well I think this is fairly self explanatory. You are using an EM2. Clearly the game is rebelling against you and making you miserable until you use another gun.

Kidding. I honestly have no idea. Are you on PC or console?

item.title: By: MelonConCarne
item.dc:creator: MelonConCarne
item.description: Could you have accidentally turned on color blindness settings?
item.content:encoded: Could you have accidentally turned on color blindness settings?

item.title: By: DanHarkinz
item.dc:creator: DanHarkinz
item.description: Honestly thought this was Combine from BO3 for a nano second
item.content:encoded: Honestly thought this was Combine from BO3 for a nano second
